text: 'Why don't you give them something to play with?' 'They've found their own toy, said Ormston, 'and this is it. They want to abstain next week.' The Prime Minister continued in his flippant tone, 'Tell the Chief to give them a talking-to.' The Chancellor closed his eyes, and then said,
handwritten_text: 'Why don't you give them something to play with?' 'They've found their own toy, said Ormston, 'and this is it. They want to abstain next week.' The Prime Minister continued in his flippant tone, 'Tell the Chief to give them a talking-to.' The Chancellor closed his eyes, and then said,
